name: RadioVisionLatinaMiami
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio vision latina miami
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Radio Vision Latina Miami is a Spanish-language radio station that has reached out to the Latino community with the goal of reaching out to listeners to address the various problems they experience and thus be able to guide them and provide them with solutions through the counselors they provide. They host various programs 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Life-changing testimonies are presented on Radio Vision Latina, where people testify how a life change is possible through faith.

Those who tune in to the radio can also call in, since the programs are broadcast live so that people can hear the needs or problems that they are going through.

Radio Vision Latina Miami's programs also feature segments of current news. And listeners can also enjoy a variety of music, which is for all tastes and ages of those who tune in.

Every hour, a different program is broadcast, where messages are also transmitted that inspire and motivate people not to give up, regardless of the situation, adversity or problems they are experiencing.

Disclaimer: Content in Spanish

The radio content is only in Spanish. We do not guarantee complete accuracy and are not responsible for misunderstandings. Interruptions may occur. Your understanding is your responsibility.
